requests.name: The hockey leagues endpoint serves as a decode for...
requests.description: The hockey leagues endpoint serves as a decode for the available leagues names, abbreviations, and URI paths.

queryParams.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
requests.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the hockey/leagues endpoint

Provide team ID to return information for one team.
 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: If you are permissioned for the /events resource, ...
requests.description: If you are permissioned for the /events resource, you have access to the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, and play-by-play.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the hockey/leagues endpoint

Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box or pbp requests.
   Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with box.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with pbp.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - all event types

Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
 Default - Regular Season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: This endpoint allows you to select schedule and sc...
requests.description: This endpoint allows you to select schedule and score information for just one team.  Getting information for a single team returns only schedule and score information.  If you want detailed event information, you use the example about with the eventId.

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the hockey/leagues endpoint

 Default - Blank (returns all teams).

  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
   Note: Seasons that span years like NHL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013. 
  Default - the current season

Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - all event types

Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
 Default - Regular Season

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.

requests.name: Hockey - Stats for a single player

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the hockey/leagues endpoint
To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

To get stats for only one event type, enter the eventTypeId.
  Default - all event types combined.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

requests.name: Hockey - Stats for all players on a single team

queryParams.description: Enter league uriPath - full list available in the hockey/leagues endpoint
To get stats for all players on a single team, enter the teamID.

To get stats for only one event type, enter the eventTypeId.
  Default - all event types combined.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json
Enter league uriPath - full list available in the hockey/leagues endpoint

Only one category per query.
  Default - Blank (returns goals).

Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties).

Leaders among specified conference only. See conferences decode endpoint for full list.
  Default - all

Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
  Ignored if eventId is used.
 Default - all event types

Result will return only games for the specific eventType.
 Default - Regular Season
To get stats for all players on a single team, enter the teamID.

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json
